column4: hello, I have a few .c files I wish to print. is there some nice program out there that will let me print them all into the same file ?
same file?   there are code 'printing' utilities out that can make the code look nicer/format it.
k then, such as ?? .... troxor, will that show header information as well for each ,c file
a quick 'apt-cache search print | grep code' shows    trueprint - pretty printing of source code
